name: createPostScriptSubset(subsetName:format:glyphs:count:encoding:)
desc: Creates a subset of the font in the specified PostScript format.
declaration:
func createPostScriptSubset(subsetName: CFString, 
                     format: CGFontPostScriptFormat, 
                     glyphs: UnsafePointer<CGGlyph>?, 
                      count: Int, 
                   encoding: UnsafePointer<CGGlyph>?) -> CFData?
